thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 25 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Vivotek announces 2017 dividend payment

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Vivotek announces 2017 dividend payment
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Vivotek Inc
* Says it will use undistributed profit to pay cash dividend of T$4.0 per share to shareholders for 2017
* Says it will pay cash dividend of T$327.2 million in total
* Says it will use additional paid-in capital to distribute stock dividend worth T$0.25 for every one share
* Says it will distribute stock dividend of 2 million shares in total
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/cs31GX
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
